meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jenny Church Paul Tidwell Jonathan Santore Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #782.

td.p: Jenny Church, a supervisor originally from Pensacola, Florida
Paul Tidwell, a tutor from Mission Hills, California
Jonathan Santore, a composer and graduate student originally from Greeneville, Tennessee (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,001)

tr.td: THE REVOLUTIONARY WAR
SPORTS
FADS & FASHION
AFRICA ON FILM
AUTHORS
"BEAUTIFUL" MUSIC
